meta_description: Looking for fun things to do in Yakima? Explore the Yakima Valley Museum—local history, vintage exhibits, and family-friendly fun all in one spot!

admission_text:
## Your membership makes it possible for us to offer engaging and innovative programming and exhibits and standards-aligned educational opportunities for all in our community.

Memberships give you a full year of admission to all exhibits including Children’s Underground, discounts in the Museum Store, and early access to special events and activities. All our memberships provide access to reciprocal benefits through the North American Reciprocal Museum Association and the Northwest Association of Youth Museums.

## Annual Membership Levels

Friend

$75

  * Free daily admission for two adults
  * Early access to exhibits, events, and announcements
  * 10% off all museum store purchases and summer camps

Sponsor

$125

  * Everything included in Friend Membership, plus…
  * Free Daily Admission for two named adults and children under 18
  * $5 Guest Admission when accompanied by a member
  * Reciprocal Benefits at 2,500+ museums nationwide, including:
    * 25% off at  _Northwest Association of Youth Museums_ partner museums (up to 4 people)
    * Free admission to 350+ science centers through _Association of Science-Technology Centers_
    *  _Unlimited Visits to 1,500+ arts museums through North American Reciprocal Museum Association_

Patron

$250

  * Everything included in Sponsor Membership, plus…
  * Two free guest passes to share with friends or family

Benefactor

$500

  * Everything included in Patron Membership, plus…
  * Four free guest passes to share with frien...
collections_text:
DIGITAL ARCHIVE

## History at Your Fingertips

The Yakima Memory Project is a cooperative effort between the Yakima Valley Regional Library and the Yakima Valley Museum. Here you will find digitized photographs, historical texts, memorabilia & ephemera, maps, and many more items of historical and cultural significance.

[Search The Collection](https://archives.yvl.org/home)
